alfredsnippet.snippet:
M. Polanyi, "Personal Knowledge", p.53

"According to Polanyi: 'while the articulate contents of science are successfully taught all over the world in hundreds of new universities, the unspecifiable art of scientific research has not yet penetrated to many of these.' The art of scientific research defy complete formalization, it has partly to be learned by examples from a master who's behavior one trusts."
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - The Art of Scientific Research
